attributes.title: Why have you done this
attributes.review: All my phone and credit card data were stolen from this app. 😢😭

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Worst app ever. Totally made my phone crash and I think it takes your data or something. Def deleting

attributes.title: 🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️
attributes.review: When I got this app my phone started to acted up I guess it just knew that Trump shouldn’t be the President ever again and that he should rot in jail for the rest of his sad sorry life

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: this app took a very long time to download and gave me no useful information. it was a waste of space on my phone.

attributes.title: HACKED MY PHONEE DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: When I opened it it asked for my phone number sc address email and as a loyal supporter I did but two days later my phone got hacked I had to pay 1,000 dollars for a new one now I hate Trump 😌😙

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: Never been more sickened by an app. Laggy and horrible set up. Also the whole concept of the app is questionable. Why does a racist sexist fascist need an app revolving him? Doesn’t add up

attributes.title: DONT GET THE APP
attributes.review: After I downloaded I opened the app and all of a sudden my screen is going crazy and do anything about it. I end up having to get my phone replaced due to irreparable damage. DONT DOWNLOAD O THE SAME MIGHT HAPPEN TO YOU
This app gave my phone a virus 🦠 nothing is uploading after downloading this app is a terrible app I don’t even know why this is her it should not be an app.

attributes.title: My fridge is now gone
attributes.review: I got this app to ~🧚‍♀️sHoW sUpPoRt🧚‍♀️~ but when I went to the kitchen my fridge was gone with only a note left behind that says “the app did it” and I immediately knew what had happened. THIS APP IS RESPONSIBLE. FREE. MY. FRIDGE.

attributes.title: don’t download unless u want to get ur info stolen!
attributes.review: Discusting it got glitches right away AND it took some of my info! I’m done with this app and don’t download unless u want to get ur info stolen!
